content.raw:
Resolved camera seeing itself in [dbe939b](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/dbe939b69a44e68cb52bdc24faf1755b878e2210). Based on the camera mesh, the tip of the lens should be about `0.039`m from the origin. I rounded up to `0.05` to be safe \(in case certain angles make it easy to see itself.

`<clip><near>0.02</near></clip>` =>`<clip><near>0.05</near></clip>`

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2545439929-No_Camera_See_Itself.png)
content.html:
Resolved camera seeing itself in dbe939b. Based on the camera mesh, the tip of the lens should be about 0.039m from the origin. I rounded up to 0.05 to be safe (in case certain angles make it easy to see itself.

<clip><near>0.02</near></clip> =><clip><near>0.05</near></clip>
